p: Because the use of herbal supplements improves the effects of regular exercise training (reducing ROS), it seems that the combination of exercise training and herbal supplement can counteract COVID-19 or even reduce destructive effects of COVID-19 [ 11â€“ 13]. Nigella sativa ( N. sativa) is one of the useful herbal medicines that have a strong positive effect on the lungs and also improve the immune system. Therefore, in this study, the hypothesis considers the potential role of N. sativa supplementation with physical activity in the prophylaxis and treatment of COVID-19.
